privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we protect and use your personal data

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect your personal data when you use our services, fill out our forms or contact us. This data includes your contact information, financial and professional situation necessary for the study of your credit file.

dataUse.title: Data Use
dataUse.content: Your data is used exclusively to process your financing request, offer you suitable solutions and comply with our legal obligations. We never sell your data to third parties.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data against any unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right of access, rectification, erasure, limitation of processing, portability and opposition regarding your personal data. You can exercise these rights by contacting us.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data for the period necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, in accordance with the legal obligations in force in the financial sector.

terms.title: General Terms and Conditions
terms.description: General terms and conditions for using Neovita Finanz services

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.content: These general terms and conditions aim to define the terms and conditions for using the services offered by Neovita Finanz in banking operations and payment services intermediation.

services.title: Services Offered
services.content: Neovita Finanz offers the following services:
services.advice: Advice and support for your financing projects
services.intermediation: Intermediation between you and credit institutions
services.support: Follow-up of your file until completion

remuneration.title: Remuneration
remuneration.content: Neovita Finanz's remuneration is paid by the credit institution upon completion of the financing. No fees are charged to the client.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: How we use cookies to improve your experience
cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. Learn how we use them and how you can manage them.

what.title: What is a cookie?
what.description1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to remember your actions and preferences for a certain period.
what.description2: We use cookies to improve your navigation, analyze site usage and personalize your user experience.

technical.title: Technical cookies (required)
technical.description: These cookies are essential for the site to function. They enable navigation and use of basic features.
technical.examples: Session cookies, language preferences, shopping cart

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our site by collecting anonymous information.
analytics.data: Pages visited, visit duration, traffic source

preferences.title: Preference cookies
preferences.description: These cookies remember your choices and preferences to personalize your experience.

advertising.title: Advertising cookies
advertising.description: These cookies are used to offer you relevant advertisements based on your interests.
advertising.note: You can refuse these cookies without affecting the site's operation

management.title: Cookie management
management.intro: You have full control over cookies. Here's how to manage them:

onSite.title: On our site
onSite.description: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the "Manage cookies" link at the bottom of the page.
